name: Release v31.0.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Teach qml_cache macro how to handle spaces by @kyrios123 in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/7
* Add optional linker flag icf={safe,all} to optimizations by @joebonrichie in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/20
* Export environmental variables for pgo_gen and pgo_use build contexts by @joebonrichie in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/21
* Ensure LTO for GCC runs in parallel by @joebonrichie in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/9
* Remove deprecated meson macros by @joebonrichie in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/25
* Adjust width-param so ybump doesn't set summary to 80 cols by @Staudey in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/8
* Implement sccache by @GZGavinZhao in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/26
* Profile instrumentation flags must also be added to LDFLAGS by @joebonrichie in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/10
* Adjust python macros for PEP 517 by @joebonrichie in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/24
* Allow for renaming of simple source files by @JacekJagosz in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/29
* Switch to IR based instrumentation for clang PGO builds
* Add experimental BOLT macros
* Add python3_avx2_lib_shift macro for experimental python avx2 lib support by @joebonrichie in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/19
* Add manpage compression by @EbonJaeger in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/31

## New Contributors
* @joebonrichie made their first contribution in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/19
* @GZGavinZhao made their first contribution in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/26
* @JacekJagosz made their first contribution in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/29
* @EbonJaeger made their first contribution in https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/pull/31

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/getsolus/ypkg/compare/v30...v31

name: v30
body: This release includes all of the fixes for the getsolus migration and fixes dependency scanning for PIE executables.

- Use SSE2 for 32bit builds resulting in a significant performance boost in some tests
- New python test macros
- No longer install 32bit clang as it is deprecated
- Use llvm-objcopy to strip ar archives with clang
- Remove setting locale as it is set already via solbuild
- Add environment key which exports content to all ypkg build steps
- Use flag for avx2 builds that supports clang and gcc
